subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard scored 18 points and had 15 rebounds, and he made two free throws with 13.9 seconds left as the visiting Orlando Magic defeated the Boston Celtics, 86-79.
snippet: Dwight Howard scored 18 points and had 15 rebounds, and he made two free throws with 13.9 seconds left as the visiting Orlando Magic defeated the Boston Celtics, 86-79.
